carouselItems.title: Breaking News: Earthquake Hits California
carouselItems.description: A powerful earthquake has struck the California coast, causing widespread damage and power outages.

carouselItems.title: Tech Giant Announces Major Acquisition

carouselItems.title: Sports Team Wins Championship in Dramatic Fashion
